channel.title: Vindication Mapping tool
channel.description:
Hey moparscape,
It's been quite a while since i've been around the RSPS community, and as I was going through all my old RSPS file's, I happened to stumble upon an old, but stable, and trusty Mapping tool.
I'm not entirely sure what Revision of RSPS it can handle, but if someone wants to give it a go, and PM me i'll be happy to update the topic!
*
Enjoy! ~Redemption
